s.text: Thirty-five cycles of PCR, using a mix of six oligonucleotides specific for the different VH families as primers at the 5' end and a mix of oligonucleotides corresponding to the known JH overlapping to a part of the intron sequence as primers at the 3' end, were followed by 35 cycles with 1 ?l of the first PCR products and individual VH and JH primers (at a more 5' position) ( Table 1).
Only two cases of clonal expansion characterized by identically rearranged segments were detected on different slides.
Only two cases of clonal expansion characterized by identically rearranged segments were detected on different slides.
